timeline.bodyText: Could you please add comments throughout these scope classes on the differences between each scope's behavior? There are slight differences between each scope and it is not obvious what the reasons are for those differences.
timeline.author: rjernst

replies.bodyText: Added numerous javadoc style comments throughout Scope to try to clarify the subtle differences.
replies.author: jdconrad

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we could use "used" terminology instead of "read from", as the latter is difficult to read (is it "reed" or "red"). I would also just have it called "used" or "usedVariables", not "areUsed" since "are" and "is" imply the type should be boolean. Also can you please add a comment explaining the semantics (eg used means getVariable was called for that name).
timeline.author: rjernst
